name: OvermedicateD
description:
Borded Pixel Jam #7 entry

Theme: One Ability 

You wake up in a hospital, craving for MORE medicine... You're obsessed by the lack of drug in your body... YOU... NEED... MORE!!

Try to eat all the pills in the hospital, but watch out, their effect isn't always good...

Featuring:

  • Procedurally generated dungeon each run
  • A soundtrack with not less than 4 main theme variations randomized each run  + a menu theme. Take your time and enjoy them!
  • 3 types of ennemies
  • 8 types of effects randomized on the medicines

Best played in fullscreen and with sound on!

Controls:

Moving:  WASD or Arrows / Joystick

Restart: Spacebar / B (Xbox)

Known bugs/issues:

-The placement of ennemies and obstacles is fully random so you may encounter some strange behaviors. Ex: you can spawn on medicine/mobs, random beds blocking you,  extra hard/easy rooms. Press Restart when it happens.

-You can die with the wrong number of HP if you're under certains effects (no spoil). We'll say it's for the #hardcoregaming.

-Many others which will be patched soon!

Special thanks to the whole team !!

Made with Godot
